import React from 'react' import Title from '../components/Title' import { Dados } from '../components/Dados' // function submitForm(event){ // } function click( id, color) { let element = document.getElementById(id); if (element != null) { element.style.backgroundColor = active ? color : "#C4C4C4"; } } export const Cadastro = () => { return (
<Dados /> <form className='row p-3'> <div className='col'> Dados Pessoais <br /> <input type="text" placeholder='Nome' name='nome' /> <br /> <input type="number" placeholder='Telefone' name='telefone'/> <br /> <input type="text" placeholder='Endereço' name='endereco' /> <br /><br /> Plano Escolhido <br /> <button className="button__carrosel" onClick={(event) => click(id, acao, color)}> <div id={id} className="rectang"> {FREE} </div> </button> <button>PLUS</button> </div> <div className='col'> Dados do Cartão <br /> <input type="text" placeholder='Nome do cartão' /> <br /> <input type="number" maxLength="20" pattern="[0-9]{20}" placeholder='Número do cartão' /> <br /> <input type="password" maxLength="3" pattern="[0-9]{3}" placeholder='CVC' /> </div> </form> <div> <button>ASSINAR</button> </div> </div> ) }
